name: GAIA Survivors
description:
Control a variety of robots and destroy invaders from outer space in order to save the destroyed earth!

"GAIA Survivors" is a 'Shoot 'Em Up' type sci-fi rogue-lite casual game with a retro-futuristic worldview.

・Control robots equipped with a variety of weapons and survive epic battles!


・Power up your robots with crystals collected during battles and defeat stronger enemies!



・Develop items with the ores you bring back to your home for more power ups!



・Unlock new weapons and robots, and venture into unknown stages!
